resources.string: Compatible custom tab provider not found

Chromer requires you to have any Custom tab compatible browser on your phone. Currently there are no browsers on your phone that supports it. Would you like to install Google Chrome (Free) from play store? If you already have it, then please update it to latest version.
Could not open custom tab, falling back to normal browsers
Not a supported link, try again
Set Chromer as default to open all links, or you can choose Chromer from the list when it is shown
is set as the default browser, please clear it by clicking clear defaults.
Keep your browser warmed up for faster launch
Scan your screen for links and load them in background for instant launch

This service will be used by Chromer to scan text links on your screen and load them in the background. No other information is processed by Chromer. You can still use Chromer in light mode if you choose to not grant this. For more information, launch Chromer app.

To allow Chromer to scan for links in any app, it requires you to grant accessibility service permission. Please grant accessibility permission in the next screen, after which you can enable this option and enjoy quick launches.
